Name: Gin Colheita
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The quality and style of your madeira is crucial to the success and balance of this cocktail - don't skimp – buy a colheita.
History: Created on 20th August 2014 by yours truly to accompany 'Beef, Juniper and Pistachio Canapés' for the EBLEX Quality Standard Mark Scheme for beef and lamb. Tasty meat and a tasty cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Gin Colheita contains 204 calories
